parameters.backgroundSourceType: The type of the custom background image. See VirtualBackgroundSourceType.

parameters.color: The type of the custom background image. The color of the custom background image. The format is a hexadecimal integer defined by RGB, without the # sign, such as 0xFFB6C1 for light pink.   The default value is 0xFFFFFF, which signifies white.  The value range is [0x000000, 0xffffff]. If the value is invalid, the SDK replaces the original background image with a white background image.This parameter takes effect only when the type of the custom background image is Color.
